title.narrative: SN Outcome 2.2 Men and boys recognize women and girls' right to live lives free from violence (aligned to SP Output 12)

description.narrative: Comprehensive EVAW programming comprises behavior change communication, capacity building for financial literacy, and HIV response mainstreaming for target groups in Port Moresby to create safer public spaces for women and men, girls and boys.
